message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $120. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to both of us.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $90 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. Let me propose a price of $100 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your financial considerations.
